title: 4.3 Master Challenge 3
question: Write about your viewpoints on urbanization. Explain the challenges faced due to urbanization using an ordered list. Use the number style as lowercase letters. Describe the ways to overcome the challenges of urbanization using an unordered list. Use the bullet type circle for the list. Make sure that both the lists are on a single web page.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
